content: CP 648-S firestop single wrap strips Pre-cut, intumescent, flexible firestop wrap strip to help create a fire and smoke barrier around combustible pipe penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop collars, wraps and bandages- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quicker and easier installation – no hooks, anchors or drilling Installed inside the base material – ideal when space and access are limited Ideal for very tight installations Applications Easy firestopping where combustible pipes pass through fire-rated walls and floors Concrete, masonry and gypsum wall assemblies For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete, Drywall, Masonry LEED VOC: 7.6 g/l Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to): 1:19 Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Gypsum | LEED VOC | 7.6 g/l | Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to) | 1:19 | Expansion temperature (Approx.) | 410 °F | Can be painted | No | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 212 °F ### ITEMS- 304303 - FS wrap strip CP 648-S 1-1/2 - Package Size 10 pc - 304304 - FS wrap strip CP 648-S 2 - Package Size 10 pc - 304305 - FS wrap strip CP 648-S 3 - Package Size 10 pc - 304306 - FS wrap strip CP 648-S 4 - Package Size 10 pc - 304307 - FS wrap strip CP 648-S 6 - Package Size 6 pc
